page.title: 20SUMMARY & CONTRIBUTORS
page.content:
For the children living in this area the farming life & the countryside are the dominant features of their world. Life is for many lived at a slower pace, some still not used to visitng large towns. This stands in contrast to the 'new' people in the area who have bought cottages & houses. Many of them are escaping from the towns!
Contributors: Page 1 Mr Pie Corbett; page 2 Lisa Clayton; page 3 Caroline Golding; 4 Julie Beake; 5 Ralph Wood; 6 & 7 Lena Waller; 8 & 9 Anna Budd; 10 Alice Triffitt; 11 Glenn Forster; 12, 13 & 14 Natasha Scamp, Georgina & Sarah Hammond; 15 Oliver Stephenson & Vicky Gibbard 16 Barbara Fossey; 17 Lisa Bradley 18 Rachelle Harris; 19 Miss E. Crowhurst; 20 Mr Corbett.
